info.name: Test-Lab-Reqres.in
info.description:
## Sample API collection

Example requests from this

* Register a user
* Login a user with given credentials
* Get details for a user

variable.value: (min, max) => { min = Math.ceil(min); max = Math.floor(max); return Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min)) + min; }
